Content.Raw:
维护一个滑动窗口内的哈希表。

```python
class Solution:
    def containsNearbyDuplicate(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> bool:
        s = set()
        l, r = 0, 0
        n = len(nums)
        while r < n and r <= k:
            if nums[r] in s:
                return True
            s.add(nums[r])
            r += 1
        while r < n:
            s.remove(nums[l])
            if nums[r] in s:
                return True
            s.add(nums[r])
            l += 1
            r += 1
        return False
```

Title: LeetCode-219 存在重复元素 II
